mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('表结构不一致 tbName:',tb_name,' 期望字段:',exp_columns,' 数据库中字段:',db_columns) as msg FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*)= 8 as fg,'task_detail' as tb_name,group_concat(COLUMN_NAME) db_columns, 'ID,SCRIPT,CONTENT,EXT_INFO,SERVICE_NAME,INSTANCE_NAME,GMT_CREATE,GMT_MODIFIED' exp_columns FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'task_detail' AND COLUMN_NAME in('ID','SCRIPT','CONTENT','EXT_INFO','SERVICE_NAME','INSTANCE_NAME','GMT_CREATE','GMT_MODIFIED') GROUP BY TABLE_NAME )a WHERE fg=0
